forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 57F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 8C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High near 15C. E winds shifting to SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 58F. E winds shifting to SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
